bzh.plealog.bioinfo.ui.carto.data

Class FeatureCategoryMatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • bzh.plealog.bioinfo.ui.carto.data.FeatureCategoryMatcher

  • public class FeatureCategoryMatcher
extends Object
    This class is used to check whether or not a feature is of a particular type.
    Author:
    Patrick G. Durand

    • Constructor Detail

      • FeatureCategoryMatcher

        public FeatureCategoryMatcher()

      • FeatureCategoryMatcher

        public FeatureCategoryMatcher(String keys)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        keys - a comma separated list of feature types.

      • FeatureCategoryMatcher

        public FeatureCategoryMatcher(String keys,
                      boolean matchIfInCategory)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        keys - a comma separated list of feature types.
        matchIfInCategory - if true then a feature will be member of a category if its type matches one of the keys. If false, then a feature will be rejected if its type matches one of the keys.

      • FeatureCategoryMatcher

        public FeatureCategoryMatcher(String keys,
                      FeatureCategoryMatcher.STRAND_TYPE st)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        keys - a comma separated list of feature types.
        st - strand type. A feature will match a category if its strand matches STRAND_TYPE.

      • FeatureCategoryMatcher

        public FeatureCategoryMatcher(String keys,
                      FeatureCategoryMatcher.STRAND_TYPE st,
                      boolean matchIfInCategory)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        keys - a comma separated list of feature types.
        st - strand type. A feature will match a category if its strand matches STRAND_TYPE.
        matchIfInCategory - if true then a feature will be member of a category if its type matches one of the keys. If false, then a feature will be rejected if its type matches one of the keys

      • FeatureCategoryMatcher

        public FeatureCategoryMatcher(FeatureCategoryMatcher.STRAND_TYPE st,
                      boolean matchIfInCategory)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        st - strand type. A feature will match a category if its strand matches STRAND_TYPE.
        matchIfInCategory - if true then a feature will be member of a category if its type matches one of the keys. If false, then a feature will be rejected if its type matches one of the keys

    • Method Detail

        Returns:
